title: What technology does Holidify use? - Quora

response.answer_text: HOLIDIFY.COM/EXPLORE Technology Profiler on BuiltWithHOLIDIFY.COM Technology Profiler on BuiltWithFrom above two links, I'm inferring following stack: Apache ServerPHP LanguageWordpress is showing with wordpress pluginsUbuntu OS ServerMultiple jQuery librariesMySQL Database with Geolocation pluginsjQuery UI LibraryDigital Ocean Hosting Service I'm not able to understand, how they achieved map based interface using wordpress :D . It's a content management system, and they tweaked it to be a Geolocation Showcase System. Also, why use multiple jQuery versions ?? big people in my opinion. Since Wordpress support MySQL out of the box, my successful guess will be MySQL is the database they are using. I think on the backend other technologies are also attached which probably is not visible while crawling the website. Geolocation stuff maybe SQL based or Geodjango or Rails rgeo, can't able to predict. However by the stack, my most probable guess is they are writing SQL queries and not using ORM. And Please secure your ssh holidify people. It's easy to break. ssh-keygen -t rsa -f <path-to-file>// scp it to server// set Root PasswordAuthentication to No on Ubuntu Server
